config.label: Position
config.name: position
config.helpText: Position where you want to display the image.

content.label: Alt
content.name: alt
content.helpText: Alternative text of the image. It will be displayed when the image cannot be loaded.

config.label: Content
config.name: content
config.helpText: HTML content to display next to the image.

config.label: Button
config.name: button
config.helpText: If set it will be displayed next to the image.

content.label: Href
content.name: href
content.helpText: Link to which you will redirect if the user clicks on the button.

content.label: Title
content.name: title
content.helpText: Title attribute of the previous link.

content.label: Text
content.name: text
content.helpText: Text to be displayed inside the button.
